title: The Asset Allocator: Deflation Protection Is Easy And Effective
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Deflation is the dread of the Fed, yet individuals have a clear and easy form of protection, namely, paying down debt. This brief podcast (4:05) argues that, apart from the benefits of cash as a portfolio hedge, there are other rewards for conservative debt management, including surviving a potential new round of deflation. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
